title: Stephen King - Liseys Story
description:
Lisey Landon lost her husband Scott two years ago, after a twenty-five-year marriage of profound, sometimes frightening intimacy. Scott was a celebrated, award-winning, novelist. And a complex man. Lisey knew there was a dark place where her husband ventured to face his demons. Boo&#039;ya Moon is what Scott called it; a realm that both terrified and healed him, that could eat him alive or give him the ideas he needed to write and live. Now it&#039;s Lisey&#039;s turn to face her husband&#039;s demons. And what begins as a widow&#039;s effort to sort through her husband&#039;s effects becomes a perilous journey into the heart of darkness.

&#039;Stephen King&#039;s career-best novel, LISEY&#039;S STORY, a psychological thriller of extraordinary sensitivity that takes the reader deep into the dark places in us all&#039; -- Matt Thorne, Independent on Sunday 

&#039;Contains some of the most powerful and affecting passages that King has ever written&#039; -- Barry Forshaw, Daily Express 

&#039;Popular novelist Dickens is an apt comparison -- stands among the best things that this formidable writer has done&#039; -- Sam Leith, Saturday Telegraph 

&#039;Thrilling, genuinely terrifying, beautifully textured and full of wonderful invention&#039; -- Daily Mail 

&#039;Up there with his finest ... Please don&#039;t ever give up writing, Stephen King&#039; -- Evening Standard 

&#039;King is the greatest popular novelist of our day, comparable to Dickens -- and one of the reasons for his pre-eminence is that (like Dickens) he keeps his readers with him all the time!A consummate and compassionate novel -- one of King&#039;s very best&#039; -- Toby Litt, Guardian 

&#039;Awondrous novel of marriage, a love story steeped in strength and tenderness, and cast with the most vivid, touching and believable characters in recent literature ... Adazzling novel that you&#039;ll thank yourself for reading long after the final page is turned.&#039; -- Nicholas Sparks 

&#039;An incredibly gifted storyteller&#039; -- Guardian 



Please seed 1:1.
